name: Ho Chi Minh city sightseeing 1 day tour
description: Ho Chi Minh city is not only known as a modern and biggest city in Vietnam but also well known by its charming beauties. The avenues cover by green trees shadow, the French colonial structures still remain on Notre Dame Cathedral, the Old Central Post Office and on the apartments in the center. The ancient pagodas bring a peaceful feeling, the China town is well colors throughout, the local markets are always busy all day and hundred tasty local cuisine. Those are always attractive tourists
